q: Former Defense Donald Rumsfeld Donald Rumsfeld , in an interview with the Fox News, faulted the Bush administration for failing to effectively make the case for Guantanamo Bay, saying the facility was and still is one of the finest prison systems in the world. A huge part of( Egypt's) natural product is tourism. They've got to get tourists feeling free to go back. Nobody's about to book a trip to Egypt right now.`` The United States really needs stability there, Patrick Leahy continued,`` because of our interests in Israel and Jordan and elsewhere.'' Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., had a similar response and called on the United States to support a transition to democracy.
